name: Chickgun
description:
Listen up recruit! You've been selected to protect the barn from the local riff-raff,  the Woods Gang. They've been trying to take over our barn for long enough, so now it's time to fight back! Put them eggs to good use soldier, and get out on the battlefield. That's an order!

--------------------------------------

Welcome to the game of Chickgun, a 2D twin-stick tower-defense game. In Chickgun, you'll play as 

The Recruit:  

and help to stop members of the Woods Gang:

       

 from coming and destroying the Barn. With the help of your friends

Cow: Pig:  and Sheep:  , you'll be able to keep the barn safe from those rascals. Rack up points, earn some money, and place your defenders as you please to help you win the battle.

--------------------------------------

Gameplay Examples:

--------------------------------------

What are you waiting for soldier? Get out there and defend that barn!
